entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:23 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
